__e: OK, the thing is, that, Craig, you could have told us all this days ago and you didn't.
Anyway, Craig, there's just something about him.
Okay, and now you're concerned for her and her father because Craig's going to harm them?
Craig, that's the dumbest thing I've ever seen.
Ah, well, I've called everyone who would know where Craig is, and no one does.
Why don't you tell me about Craig and the money you stole from him?
You told police you went to the game the night after Craig disappeared?
Craig said that he always thought that you and me... .. would make a totally banging couple.
You lost me after "Craig planned a job" here, fellas.
I wanted to see you in prison, but our Craig said it weren't allowed.
Craig's mom doesn't seem very happy. All right.
I'm not inside Craig's head. I don't know what he saw, but I believe he saw what he said he did.
Well, Craig, it doesn't seem like you're a danger to yourself.
